name: Capture The Cow 2D!
description:
Capture The Cow 2D is a game where you play as a UFO, who must compete against an opposing UFO to harvest cattle! The game was made in about ~48 hours for Ludum Dare 52 using C++ and the raylib library.  The theme was "Harvest" hence the game about harvesting cattle. 

It was a really fun exercise making this game, and was a really great exploration into making games from scratch. We look forward to seeing/hearing any feedback, and we hope you enjoy! :)

HOW TO PLAY

Player 1 (RED) : WASD to move

Player 2 (BLUE) : ARROW keys to move

Use your UFO's beam to attract cows towards your ship, then bring them to your crop circle to earn points.

COW POINT VALUES:

White Cow = 1pt

Spotted Cow = 2pt

Brown Cow = 3pt

Strawberry Cow = 5pt

Each match lasts 2 minutes. Earn the most points to win!

CREDIT

Art & Music Assets - Malorie Riggle

Spaghetti Code - Skyler Riggle

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS

1. Download the .zip file from the itch.io page

2. Extract the files in the .zip into a directory of your choosing (keep all files in the same directory)

3. To launch the game, open the .exe file extracted from the .zip

4. Have fun! :)
